Hey <@UBNBAAQSH>, if you leave the font-family alone in a HubDB RTE, then those tags will eventually inherit the styles from the theme/page.

But if you specifically chose a font-family, then that chosen font will be serialized as inline styles and thus override the theme styles on the page the HubDB column is used on.

> Recently noticed that the HubDB Rich Text field assigns a font family no matter what.
For more clarification, do you simply mean that the font dropdown in the toolbar shows a value thatâ€™s different from your anticipated theme font? Or are you saying that inline styles are automatically being applied to html tags in the RTE _without selecting a font-family from the toolbar at all?_
